description.full: Experience the brutal fast-paced action of frontline combat where a single squad can turn the tide of battle and become legendary, in Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 2. It's the forty-first millennium in the Sub-Sector Aurelia–a cluster of worlds on the edge of the Galaxy–where a battle of epic proportions is about to commence. Ancient races will clash across the planets that dot this section of space, battling for the greatest of stakes, not only the claim to the land and its bounty, but the fate of each race.
